status: '''1917–1922:''' Sovereign state '''1922–1991''': Union Republic (with priority of republican legislation from 1990)
symbol: Emblem of the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic
anthem: (1917–1918) Рабочая Марсельеза ''Rabochaya Marsel'yeza'' ("Worker's Marseillaise") File:Rabotshaja-Marcelesa.ogg  (1918–1944) Интернационал ''Internatsional'' ("The Internationale") File:Internationale-ru.ogg  (1944–1990) Государственный гимн СССР ''Gosudarstvenny gimn SSSR'' ("State Anthem of the Soviet Union") File:Soviet Anthem Instrumental 1955.ogg  (1990–1991) Патриотическая песня ''Patrioticheskaya pesnya'' ("The Patriotic Song") The Patriotic Song
footnote_c: As Chairman of the VTsIK (All-Russian Central Executive Committee).
footnote_d: As chairman the Supreme Soviet of the RSFSR from 29 May 1990 to 10 July 1991, then as President of Russia (Russian Federation).
footnote_e: As Chairman of the Council of People's Commissars of the Russian SFSR
footnote_f: As Chairmen of the Council of Ministers – Government of the Russian SFSR
footnote_g: Served as acting head of government while President of Russia
footnotes2: The Russian Democratic Federative Republic existed briefly on 19 January 1918, but actual sovereignty was still in the hands of the Soviets even after the Russian Constituent Assembly opened its first and last session in 1918.
